data.title: Latest news, views, pictures, video
data.meta_description: After the hit film Ghost, Demi Moore became the best-paid actress of the 1990s. Her 13-year-marriage to Die Hard star Bruce Willis produced three children. Five years after their split she married toyboy Ashton Kutcher, but the marriage broke down in 2011 following allegations he was unfaithful.
data.text:
Paramount+'s new drama could be Taylor Sheridan's next Yellowstone level hit - here's everything we know so far

'I'm a TV writer and these are the 10 best new films and shows to watch in July'

Demi Moore 'excited' to be stripping off again at 61 for new horror movie The Substance

Demi Moore fires expletives at amfAR Gala audience as she introduces Cher: 'I f*****g don't think so'

Demi Moore's naked scene in body horror The Substance dubbed 'grossest thing you will see all year'

After the hit film Ghost, Demi Moore became the best-paid actress of the 1990s. Her 13-year-marriage to Die Hard star Bruce Willis produced three children. Five years after their split she married toyboy Ashton Kutcher, but the marriage broke down in 2011 following allegations he was unfaithful.
